name: A Miner's Life
description:
This is our jam submission for Ludum Dare 44

You play a miner who needs to feed an horrible Alien with gems to regain life.

But there is a twist, a stock exchange system determines how much life each type of gems is worth.

You'd better feed the right gem at the right time to stay alive.

Your life is definitely a currency for this sadistic Alien....
